dcterms:creator: Y. Yang
R. Walker
A. Vietti
dcterms:description: A novel dataset of the Fascian dialect of Ladin, collected from native speakers in Italy, used for analyzing speech representations and classifying phonemes.
dcterms:title: Ladin dataset (Fascian dialect)

dcterms:creator: B. McFee
V. Lostanlen
A. Metsai
dcterms:description: Mel-frequency cepstral coefficients (MFCC) are used as traditional speech representations for analyzing phonemes in the Ladin language.
dcterms:title: MFCC (Mel-frequency cepstral coefficients)

dcterms:creator: S. A. Alim
N. K. A. Rashid
dcterms:description: Linear Predictive Coding (LPC) is used as a traditional speech representation for analyzing phonemes in the Ladin language.
dcterms:title: LPC (Linear Predictive Coding)

dcterms:creator: A. van den Oord
dcterms:description: WaveNet is a deep generative model used for learning discriminative representations of speech in the context of phoneme classification.
dcterms:title: WaveNet

dcterms:creator: N. Srivastava
E. Mansimov
R. Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: Autoencoder representations (Small AE, Big AE, Small LSTM AE, Big LSTM AE) are used for learning speech representations in the context of phoneme classification.
dcterms:title: Autoencoder representations (Small AE, Big AE, Small LSTM AE, Big LSTM AE)
